abstract: The billionaire investor Carl C. Icahn disclosed that he had bought another 4.64 million shares of Lions Gate studio in the open market after his hostile tender offer expired, bringing his total stake to 37.9 percent.
snippet: The billionaire investor Carl C. Icahn disclosed that he had bought another 4.64 million shares of Lions Gate studio in the open market after his hostile tender offer expired, bringing his total stake to 37.9 percent.
lead_paragraph: 5:16 p.m. | Updated Now we know who was behind the jump in Lions Gate Entertainment‘s stock price on Thursday: Carl C. Icahn.

headline.main: Icahn Buys More Lions Gate Stock After Offer Ends
